vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.CashOut (patch_18.sol#27-36):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#32-34)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_18.sol#33)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#32-34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_18.sol#35)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.Deposit (patch_18.sol#17-25):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_18.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_18.sol#23)

vulnerability_findings.message: LastMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_18.sol#53) is a local variable never initialiazed
